sentences.en: Cardiac orifice mucosal laceration and oozing of blood were 100 %, but no perforation and massive hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 术中可见贲门黏膜撕裂、渗血, 未见致命性出血及穿孔等并发症.

sentences.en: First, the medical term for a cut or tear in the skin is a laceration.
sentences.cn: 首先，这种皮肤的切口或裂口在医学上称为撕裂伤。

sentences.en: He had a laceration on his head.
He has a bleeding de - gloving scalp laceration, multiple facial adistended abdomen, and an agonal breathing pattern.
sentences.cn: 下颌部头皮裂伤并出血, 面部多处损伤,腹部明显膨隆, 濒死呼吸.

sentences.en: He has a laceration on his right arm.
He has a laceration on his right forearm.
He was taken to the local clinic and received thirteen staples to close the laceration.
sentences.cn: 该员工立即被送往当地诊所,伤口缝了十三针.

sentences.en: Here, we report a 20 - year - old man sustaining major liver laceration with contrast extravasation and massive hemoperitoneum.
sentences.cn: 我们在此报告一位20 岁 男性外伤病例,患重大肝脏裂伤,合并显影剂滞留及大量腹膜腔出血.

sentences.en: I often think of the Tiny Love Wind Chime Recall in which baby wind chime toys came apart and caused a puncture and laceration hazard.
sentences.cn: 我经常想起小小爱风铃召回事件。 在这起事件里，婴儿风铃破碎，并造成了被刺到、被割到的伤害。

sentences.en: It occurs in the laceration and contusion as well as in the clean surgical incision.
sentences.cn: 撕裂伤,挫伤和外科清洁切口,都会发生这种现象.

sentences.en: Methods CT and MRI findings of shear - laceration of brain in 19 cases were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性分析了19例脑深部剪裂伤的CT和MRI影像 表现和特点.

sentences.en: Objective To estimate the curative effect of anastomosed laceration canaliculus.
sentences.cn: 目的评价显微吻合外伤性泪小管断离的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To increase the curative effect of extensive cerebral contusion and laceration.
sentences.cn: 目的提高广泛脑挫裂伤病人的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the effects of silicon tube insertion for repair of canaliculi laceration.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨鼻内窥镜在泪小管断裂吻合术中的方法及效果.

sentences.en: Objective To summarize clinical feature and therapeutic measure in and laceration of brain accompanied with hematoma.
sentences.cn: 目的总结额颞部脑挫裂伤伴血肿患者的临床特点和治疗措施.

sentences.en: Objectives : To analysis the cause of uterine laceration with Micheal Stark Caesarian Section.
sentences.cn: 目的: 回顾性分析新式剖宫产术的临床资料,解析子宫切口撕裂的原因.

sentences.en: Results: Trachea and bronchus laceration were caused by injury.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高对气管、支气管裂伤的认识.

sentences.en: The main symptoms were subconjunctival hemorrhage, corneal epithelial abrasion, eyelid skin laceration.
sentences.cn: 眼部主要表现为球结膜下出血 、 角膜上皮擦伤 、 眼睑皮肤裂伤.

words.tran_cn: 撕裂（lacerate的过去式和过去分词）；划破
